# Exp 70

Are replicates of exp60 except for,

Phase in PAC (OZ) is take from the osc population.

```{r helper_fns, echo=FALSE, fig.width=6, fig.height=4, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(grid)
library(gridExtra)
library(plyr)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape)
library(png)

path <- "/home/ejp/src/pacological/data"

load.data <- function(path, type, rates, gs, Ns, pns){
  df <- NULL
  for(r_s in rates){
    for(g in gs){
      for(N in Ns){
        for(pn in pns){
          try({
            name <- paste("Istim-", as.character(r_s), 
                          "_g-", as.character(g),
                          "_N-", as.character(N),
                          "_pn-", as.character(pn),
                          "__", as.character(type), 
                          "_summary.csv", sep="")
            di <- read.csv(paste(path, name, sep=""))
            di["Istim"] <- rep(r_s, nrow(di))
            di["g"] <- rep(g, nrow(di))
            di["N"] <- rep(N, nrow(di))
            di["pn"] <- rep(pn, nrow(di))
            
            df <- rbind(df, di)  
          })  
        }
      }
    }
  }
  df
}

load.demo <- function(path, type, rates, ks){
  dexp <- NULL
  for(r_o in rates){
    for(r_s in rates){
      for(k in ks){
        try({
          name <- paste("Iosc-", as.character(r_o), 
                      "_Istim-", as.character(r_s), 
                      "_k", as.character(k), 
                      "_", as.character(type), 
                      ".csv", sep="")
          di <- read.csv(paste(path, name, sep=""))
          di["Iosc"] <- rep(r_o, nrow(di))
          di["Istim"] <- rep(r_s, nrow(di))
          di["k"] <- rep(k, nrow(di))
          
          dexp <- rbind(dexp, di)  
       })
      }
    }
  }
dexp
}
```

```{r load70, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
rates <- c(2, 6, 10, 14, 18, 22, 26, 30)
gs <- c(1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
Ns <- c(100, 200, 300, 400, 500)
pns <- c(0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1)

exp70path <- paste(path, "/exp70/", sep="")
mi_exp70 <- load.data(exp70path, "MI", rates, gs, Ns, pns)
h_exp70 <- load.data(exp70path, "H", rates, gs, Ns, pns)
pac_exp70 <- load.data(exp70path, "PAC", rates, gs, Ns, pns)
```

```{r fig170, fig.width=6, fig.height=4, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# -- MI
# Sel N and p
mi_fig70 <- filter(mi_exp70, N == 100, pn == 1.00)

# Get Avg MI for stim
Mstim <- mean((filter(mi_fig70, X == "stim_p"))$mean)
mi_fig70$mean <- mi_fig70$mean - Mstim

# Select, rename, and order 'em
mi_fig70 <- filter(mi_fig70, X %in% c("gain_p", "silenced_p", "summed_p"))
mi_fig70$X <- revalue(mi_fig70$X, c("gain_p"="EI", "summed_p"="E", "silenced_p"="I"))
mi_fig70$X <- factor(mi_fig70$X, levels=c("EI", "E", "I")) 

# Sum and plot
mi_stats <- group_by(mi_fig70, X)
mi_stats <- summarise(mi_stats, M=mean(mean), SD=sd(mean))
limits <- aes(ymax = M + SD, ymin=M - SD)

f70a <- qplot(data=mi_stats, x=X, y=M, geom="bar", stat="identity", width=.75) + geom_errorbar(limits, width=0.2, color="grey") + ylab(expression(paste(Delta, "MI"))) + theme_bw() + geom_hline(yintercept=0, color="grey") + xlab("") + ggtitle("Exp 59")

# 2B, Series
mi_exp70 %>% 
  filter(N == 100, pn == 1.00, X %in% c("gain_p", "silenced_p", "summed_p", "stim_p")) %>%
  droplevels() -> mi_fig70b

mi_fig70b$X <- revalue(mi_fig70b$X, c("gain_p"="EI", "summed_p"="E", "silenced_p"="I", "stim_p"="S"))

# Get subtract mean I_stim
mi_fig70b %>% select(mean, Istim, g, X) %>% 
  group_by(Istim, g, X) %>%
  cast(Istim + g ~ X, value = "mean") %>%
  mutate(E=E - S, I = I - S, EI = EI - S) %>%
  select(-S) %>% 
  melt(id=c('Istim', 'g'), variable_name = 'model') -> mi_stats

mi_stats$model <- revalue(mi_stats$model, c("EI"="EI"))
mi_stats$model <- factor(mi_stats$model, levels=c("EI", "E", "I"))

f70b <- qplot(data=mi_stats, x=Istim, y=value, facets=.~model, color=g, geom="line", group=g) + 
  theme_bw() + 
  xlim(0,30) + 
  ylab(expression(paste(Delta, "MI"))) +
  geom_hline(yintercept=0, color="grey") + 
  xlab(expression(r[s])) +
  theme(strip.background = element_blank(), axis.title.x = element_text(colour = "red")) +
  ggtitle("Exp 70")
print(f70b)
```
